enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve initializing the queue state, specifically setting the start and end indices to 0.
Both methods modify the internal state of the queue, specifically by resetting or modifying the start and end indices.
After clearing the queue, the state should be verified to ensure it is empty, similar to how isEmpty() checks the queue state.
After clearing the queue, the size should be verified to ensure it is 0, similar to how size() checks the queue size.
